# OperatingSystemVersion

**Structure**

A structure that contains version information about the currently executing operating system, including major, minor, and patch version numbers.

## Declaration

```swift
struct OperatingSystemVersion
```

## Overview

Use the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo] property [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/operatingSystemVersion] to fetch an instance of this type. You can also pass this type to [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/isOperatingSystemAtLeast(_:)] to determine whether the current operating system version is the same or later than the given value.

## Creating an Operating System Version

- **init()**: Creates an empty operating system version.
- **init(majorVersion:minorVersion:patchVersion:)**: Creates an operating system version with the provided values.

## Version Components

- **majorVersion**: The major release number, such as 10 in version 10.9.3.
- **minorVersion**: The minor release number, such as 9 in version 10.9.3.
- **patchVersion**: The update release number, such as 3 in version 10.9.3.
- **majorVersion**: The major release number, such as 10 in version 10.9.3.
- **minorVersion**: The minor release number, such as 9 in version 10.9.3.
- **patchVersion**: The update release number, such as 3 in version 10.9.3.

## Getting Host Information

- **hostName**: The name of the host computer on which the process is executing.
- **operatingSystemVersionString**: A string containing the version of the operating system on which the process is executing.
- **operatingSystemVersion**: The version of the operating system on which the process is executing.
- **isOperatingSystemAtLeast(_:)**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the version of the operating system on which the process is executing is the same or later than the given version.
- **operatingSystem()**: Returns a constant to indicate the operating system on which the process is executing.
- **Anonymous**: The following constants are provided by the `NSProcessInfo` class as return values for [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/ProcessInfo/operatingSystem()].
- **operatingSystemName()**: Returns a string containing the name of the operating system on which the process is executing.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
